effect.Name: Pin Light
effect.description: Pin Light - (The effect comes from the Photoshop) Replaces the colors, depending on the blend color. If the blend color (light source) is lighter than 50% gray, pixels darker than the blend color are replaced, and pixels lighter than the blend color do not change. If the blend color is darker than 50% gray, pixels lighter than the blend color are replaced, and pixels darker than the blend color do not change. This is useful for adding special effects to an image
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Pin Light (Background) Shader | 1.1 (24.06.2024) */
parameter.description: (The effect comes from the Photoshop) Replaces the colors, depending on the blend color. If the blend color (light source) is lighter than 50% gray, pixels darker than the blend color are replaced, and pixels lighter than the blend color do not change. If the blend color is darker than 50% gray, pixels lighter than the blend color are replaced, and pixels darker than the blend color do not change. This is useful for adding special effects to an image

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable sets the intensity of base visibility
